long_description: The Pediped Sahara sandals are equally at home on land or at sea, making them a great choice for all of his summer adventures. Water-safe nubuck leather uppers feature synthetic webbing accents; rip-and-stick straps secure the fit; rubber toe caps protect little feet. Neoprene linings wrap around feet for a secure fit, and dry quickly after water play. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Rubber outsoles offer a secure grip on varied terrain. Machine washable for easy care.
short_description: The Pediped Sahara sandals are equally at home on land or at sea, making them a great choice for all of his summer adventures.
